arr.title: FitRise
arr.subtitle: Fitness Website
arr.description: A cloud-connected step, water intake, and sleep tracker that adjusts the user's daily goals based on the previous day's performance. Includes a friends system, rewards system, and role-based security.
role: Sole-backend developer as part of a team

arr.title: Fists of Fate
arr.subtitle: Fighting Game
arr.description: A 2.5D fighting game. Includes a computer-controlled player in addition to standard human local multiplayer. Coded in a designer-friendly fashion for quick and easy changes to character data.

arr.title: Drum Game Clone
arr.subtitle: Rhythm Game
arr.description: A Python clone of the rhythm game Taiko no Tatsujin.
